topics.body:
Ugh; well minecraft is probably going to die sales wise sooner rather than later.

Short version is minecraft 1.8 is horribly optimized.  Basically as time goes on minecraft is going to get progressively more and more laggy so by the time minecraft 2.0 comes out it'll be fucking impossible for you to run mods without your computer having a breakdown.

RIP minecraft.

"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547fdf256368726327070100#post_547fdf256368726327070100
Pues será otra noche de leer términos y condiciones, me voy a preparar una tasa de atole y a calentar unos tamales. Mientras tanto te cuento que una de las razones por las cuales me agrada es que ella toma en cuenta a Spike para su historia, mal entretejida, pero linda al final. Para mi, el que no olvide a Spike le da muchos puntos, aunque creo que lo puede explotar mejor.

topics.body:
So I just had a thought.
Pacific Rim is basically an alternate take on Lovecraftian Horror. Instead of shrinking back and dying in the face of eldritch extra-dimensional horrors, humanity stands up, looks the monster dead in the eyes, gives them the finger, and says "Fuuuuuuuuuck Yoooooouuuuu" with the assistance of giant robots.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

Honestly I think it's for the best cause the sooner mojang fucks up minecraft the sooner microsoft stops dicking with minecraft.

No offense, but mojang and notch are the very definition of a one hit wonder.

1.8 "Why is there so much fucking lag?"
1.9 is going to be "Holy balls minecraft sucks now"
2.0 is going to be microsoft going "What the fuck happened to all the sales?"
2.1 nobody is going to play it's going to be so bad.

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547fe3866368725f0da80100#post_547fe3866368725f0da80100
Pues si, la verdad el estilo visual era lo que valía la pena, la historia era mala; genérica, mal articulada, llena de clichés, jaladísima, aburrida, claramente algo demasiado largo para terminarlo. Con todo respeto parecía mas la trama de un otaku que no pensó muy bien lo que hizo que una historia realmente épica. De ahí que yo y muchos mas sólo recordemos los calzones de Applejack y en mi caso su diseño de Spike.
